organize_by_extension¶

class organize_by_extension.OrganizeByExtensionExtension[source]¶

Bases: Object, MenuProvider

Extension to organize files by extension in Nautilus.

get_file_items(files: List[Any]) → List[Any][source]¶

Return a list of menu items for the selected files.

Parameters:

files – List of selected file items

Returns:

List of menu items to display

organize_by_extension(_menu: Any, files: List[Any]) → None[source]¶

Invoke external script to organize files by extension.

Parameters:

  • _menu – Ignored menu parameter

  • files – List of selected file items

Project name not set
